verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take this bread, I give to you And as you do remember Me This bread is my body broken for you So take it, and eat it And each time you do Remember Me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take this cup I give to you And as you do, remember Me This cup is My covenant in My blood So take it and drink it And each time you do Remember Me.{/lang-eng}
